  2. Anthropic CEO says AGI is a marketing term and the next AI milestone will be like a 'country of geniuses in a data center'  Business Insider
  3. Claude will eventually start speaking up during your chats  TechRadar
  4. Anthropic CEO Says AI Could Surpass Human Intelligence by 2027  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Anthropic chief says AI could surpass “almost all humans at almost everything” shortly after 2027  Ars Technica

item.title: Franciscan expert on artificial intelligence addresses its ethical challenges - Catholic News Agency
item.description:
1. Franciscan expert on artificial intelligence addresses its ethical challenges  Catholic News Agency
  2. Pope to World Economic Forum: AI must promote and never violate human dignity  Vatican News - English
  3. Pope Francis gives his support for AI, but it must be ‘ordered to the human person’  Crux Now
  4. Pope warns Davos summit that AI could worsen ‘crisis of truth’  The Guardian
  5. Pope decries 'crisis of truth' in AI message to Davos forum  Reuters
